backends.name: primary-r2
backends.comment: Primary R2 bucket - all writes go here

backends.name: fallback-r2
backends.comment: Fallback R2 bucket - reads try here if not found in primary

important_notes: R2 requires region to be 'us-east-1', not 'auto'
Replace YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID with your Cloudflare account ID
Get credentials from Cloudflare dashboard: R2 > Manage R2 API Tokens
Each backend can point to a different bucket in the same or different accounts
